quote_last: the next day after slashing his wrists with a razor blade in the second cubicle from the left in the men’s washroom on the third floor.
title: Now: Zero
author: J.G. Ballard

quote_first: Then he began to breathe more freely; “the girl,” as he always mentally dubbed her, could not enter the grounds now without his seeing her. He looked at his watch for the third time—
quote_last: . Just about the time he had planned. She should be here soon if she had left Miss Lloyd’s a little after two.
title: Silverthorns
author: Mrs. Molesworth
